title: What ever happended to the demand by the Brunswick County DA that the Judge Jolly issue a public apology?
text:
Reporter Andrew Dunn is working on a follow-up story to this one:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110418/ARTICLES/110419642/1017/news0102?p=1&tc=pg



So far Judy Jolly  has not responded to our requests for comment.



Any updates will appear at StarNewsOnline.com.
